PrecisDecision of the Governor in Council to UPHOLD a ruling (CRTC 2002-82) made by the Canadian Radio-television and Telecommunications Commission on April 8, 2002, concerning the issuance of a broadcasting licence to Rogers Broadcasting Limited for the operation of a multilingual ethnic television station serving Toronto.
